p: Experiments should also be carried out at a larger scale, such as experimental granaries, with the purpose of estimating the quantity of oil per ton of wheat needed and thus the practical applicability of these treatments. Indeed, under mass storage conditions, the application of essential oils during the grain filing process in the silo is based on nano-drop pulverization which could greatly increase the evaporation of the product. Moreover, the formulation of the essential oil is also of tremendous importance as discussed by Maes et al. [ 59]. In our cases, dilutions were made using acetone which is also quite different from actual industrial application. These points should be further analyzed in details.
